name: Aetherpedia Volume 1
description:
Expand Your Gameplay

This is the first in hopefully many expansions under the Aetherpedia banner aimed at expanding the gameplay options of my Aether core game to give you all new experiences. This first volume features 20 pages of the following: 

  • New gameplay mechanics like "Freeze," effects and Aura abilities.
  • Rules for mounts.
  • 50 new player abilities.
  • Narrator-less gameplay options with sub-sections for both grid and theater of the mind based encounters!

The PDFs are split into Desktop mode for wider screens and Pages for mobile.
